label-printing.title: EXPORT DATA / LABEL PRINTING
label-printing.label.too.long: Barcode field {0} exceeded the 80 character limit
label-printing.study.name: Study Name
label-printing.germplasmlist.name: List name
label-printing.preset.heading: Preset options
label-printing.choose.format: Choose the format you would like to use:
label-printing.choose.preset.text: You can save these settings as a preset to use again by entering a name below.
label-printing.enter.specs.for.label: Please select the size of your label sheet and specify the number of rows of labels it contains. Labels will be laid out in three columns.
label-printing.number.of.rows.per.page: Number of rows per page of label
label-printing.specify.label.details.message: If you need a label size that is not currently supported, you can choose the CSV data output option, select the data fields you need, and then export  a data file to use with an external label-creation template.
label-printing.include.headings: Include column headings in XLS export?
label-printing.choose.option.fields.germplasm.list: Your labels can include up to five rows, with two fields per row.  Drag items from the List Details into the Left or Right Side Fields to design your label layout.
label-printing.choose.option.fields.study: Your labels can include up to five rows, with two fields per row.  Drag items from the Study Details and Study List Details into the Left or Right Side Fields to design your label layout.
label-printing.choose.option.fields.csv.xls.germplasm.l: Drag fields from the List Details into Selected Fields to add them to your export file.
label-printing.choose.option.fields.csv.xls.study: Drag fields from the Study Details and Study List Details into Selected Fields to add them to your export file.
label-printing.choose.option.fields.csv.xls.study.stock: Drag fields from the Study Details and Stock List Details into Selected Fields to add them to your export file.
label-printing.do.you.need.bar.codes: Do you need barcodes on your labels?
label-printing.do.you.want.automatically.unique.bar.cod: Do you want to use automatically generated unique barcodes?
label-printing.bar.code.note: You can use a single field for your barcode, or join up to three fields to create a unique ID value for your labels.
label-printing.bar.code.needed.error: Please choose if the barcode is needed
label-printing.bar.code.field.error: Please choose at least 1 barcode field
label-printing.filename.description: Specify the name of the file
label-printing.save.preset.heading: Save settings
label-printing.selected.fields.error: Please choose at least 1 from the available fields
label-printing.filename.fields.error.character: Filename should not contain invalid character.
label-printing.filename.fields.error.invalid: Please enter a valid filename. Please make sure it does not contain invalid characters and have proper format. The following characters are not allowed \ / : * ? " < > | .
label-printing.available.fields.list.name: List Name
label-printing.available.fields.germplasm.name: Germplasm Name
label-printing.available.fields.study.name: Study Name
label-printing.available.fields.block.name: Block Name
label-printing.available.fields.field.name: Field Name
label-printing.not.available.fields.message: The following fields are not available in the study you selected, and will not be included in the labels:
label-printing.not.all.instances.have.fieldmaps: Some instances of this study do not have field plans. Field Name, Block Name, and Coordinates will not be available for labels for these instances.

label-printing.confirmation.export.without.save.preset: Proceed export label without saving label printing setting?
label-printing.preset.name.is.empty: Preset name field is empty, please enter the name of the preset if you would like to save these settings.
label-printing.confirmation.delete.program.setting.text: Are you sure you want to delete {0}?
label-printing.cannot.save.standard.preset: You cannot override an existing standard preset. Please change to a new preset name.

label-printing.cannot.retrieve.presets: Cannot retrieve label printing preset. Cause: {0}
label-printing.error.parsing.preset.xml: Cannot parse label printing preset xml from database.
